TopicTitle: Accidently changed default dll opener to notepad

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Somehow while being my usual idiotic self I have managed to change my default dll file opener to notepad. I was curious to see what was in a dll file inside of TACLS and opened with notepad, not realising that now that has become the default. Now when i try to launch ksp it  crashes before even loading. 

Not sure if this helps but...

Output log

If someone could help a minor imbecile out it would be greatly appreciated.

 

 

DJ

 

Edited July 23, 2017 by DeadJoe

The default program to open a .dll should NOT change anything inside KSP.
A far more likely scenario is that you by accident changed something inside the .dll. Try re-installing it and see what happens.

64 Output Log

Ok I've reinstalled and taken it back to stock. Weird thing is, 32 plays fine but 64 still crashes before loading?? Output Log link above.

Any Ideas??

Edit: Turns out it was Riva Tuner causing problems. Game running fine now

Edited July 23, 2017 by DeadJoe
